title: Client - Tree Icon Oversized
body: I asked my friends if they see the same problem when they view my profile, but it is only when you are logged in viewing your own profile and have the tree icon. It goes under your rank border. I told them to try putting the tree icon, and they get the same issue as well. Just throwing that out there ^.^ It's been like that since the last patch. I didn't have a chance to post until now.

replies.body:
Hey Silly Jess! 

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're currently working on a fix!
